description: Try our easy to follow Asian-Style Oysters recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Oysters,Tree nut free,Egg free,Seafood,Sesame free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Asian-Style Oysters Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 lime, 1 juiced, 1 cut into wedges (wedges to serve)
1 fresh long red chilli, deseeded, thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Place chopped coriander, vinegar, mirin, soy sauce, zest, lime juice and ginger in a bowl. Stir to combine. Season to taste.
Arrange oysters on a platter. Spoon dressing over each and top with onion, chilli and extra coriander. Serve with extra lime wedges.
